explanation: [0-0] A man with messy black hair, wearing glasses and a plaid shirt, stands in front of a green blackboard, holding a piece of chalk in his hand.

[0-7] The man then draws lines on the blackboard and looks at a student wearing a red and yellow hat, glasses and taro purple clothes. The student is holding a marker and imitating the teacher's lines on a piece of white paper. There is a white shelf in the classroom with books and a blue craft on it, and a green plant beside it.
